entries.start: Hey!  You there!   Our company is trying out their new vehicle line in this city, and you look the kind of person who might want a free vehicle.  Am I right?
entries.goodbye2: Remember, this is only a free trial.  The vehicle will expire and self-destruct in 16 DAYS.  Have fun!
entries.toomany: Hmm.  Didn't I give you one already?  If you'd like a different vehicle, please destroy your old one first.
